meanings.definition: Encouraging or arousing interest or enthusiasm
meanings.sent1: The stimulating book captivated the young readers.
meanings.sent2: The stimulating conversation sparked a lively debate.
meanings.sent3: The stimulating movie kept everyone on the edge of their seats.
meanings.sent4: The stimulating music set the party atmosphere on fire.
meanings.sent5: The stimulating presentation left a lasting impression on the audience.

meanings.sent1: The stimulating game got everyone cheering and clapping.
meanings.sent2: The stimulating event drew a large crowd of spectators.
meanings.sent3: The stimulating news spread like wildfire among the students.
meanings.sent4: The stimulating performance lit up the stage with energy.
meanings.sent5: The stimulating competition brought out the best in all participants.

meanings.definition: Making someone feel more awake and active
meanings.sent1: The stimulating drink gave him a burst of energy.
meanings.sent2: The stimulating exercise routine invigorated her body.
meanings.sent3: The stimulating alarm clock jolted him awake in the morning.
meanings.sent4: The stimulating aroma of coffee woke up her senses.
meanings.sent5: The stimulating morning walk refreshed his mind and body.
